title: Blessing Appiah – MBA Portfolio
text:
I’m Blessing Appiah, an MBA candidate with a strong foundation in business strategy, data-driven decision-making, and leadership. I bring a unique blend of professional experience in telecommunications regulation and a passion for tech-enabled solutions that drive impact.
With a background in engineering and public sector strategy, I thrive at the intersection of innovation, policy, and growth. I’m currently expanding my business acumen to lead cross-functional teams and scale data-driven initiatives globally.
